sentences.en: A: Uggh ! This milk tastes like puke!
sentences.cn: 啊! 这牛奶的味道像馊水!

sentences.en: Before the year 2000 by the Swedish Ajie Machakos ? Ke Puke Transnational Group Holdings.
sentences.cn: 2000年前由瑞典阿捷科斯? 科普柯跨国集团控股.

sentences.en: Good grief, Tom. Is that puke on your shoe, or what?
sentences.cn: 哎呀, 汤姆, 你鞋子上的东西是吐出来的还是别的什么?

sentences.en: He was fully clothed and covered in puke and piss.
I figured, why eat when I was going to puke it up again?
sentences.cn: 我在想反正还得吐出来，那干吗还吃呢？

sentences.en: If you want to puke, just go ahead.
sentences.cn: 如果你想吐, 就去吐吧.

sentences.en: It makes me want to puke ( ie It disgusts me )!
sentences.cn: 这真让人恶心 ( 使我感到厌恶 )!

sentences.en: It makes me want to puke!
Nicky: Oh god no. I'll puke if I have tequila.
sentences.cn: 尼基: 噢,千万不要. 要是喝龙舌兰酒的话我会吐的.

sentences.en: There's people getting drunk And you've got to finish the thing you puke.
sentences.cn: 有的人边做边喝,你可得在吐得一塌糊涂前做完才行.

sentences.en: Whether you call it spit-up, puke or barf mulch, there’s simply no denying the fact that every article of clothing you own will eventually start to smell like baby vomit.
sentences.cn: 不管你管他叫吐出来的东西还是呕吐物什么的，不可否认的是你身上的每件东西都开始闻起来像婴儿呕吐物。

trans.tran_cn: 呕吐, 呕吐物, 吐剂
trans.tran_en: food brought back up from your stomach through your mouth
